detaileddescription.para: cache_inode_rename_cached_dirent: renames an entry in the same directory.
Renames an entry in the same directory.

parameterdescription.para: [INOUT] cache entry representing the directory to be managed.
[IN] name of the entry to rename.
[IN] hash table used for the cache, unused in this call.
[INOUT] ressource allocated by the client for the nfs management.

memberdef.argsstring: (cache_entry_t *pentry_dirsrc, fsal_name_t *poldname, cache_entry_t *pentry_dirdest, fsal_name_t *pnewname, fsal_attrib_list_t *pattr_src, fsal_attrib_list_t *pattr_dst, hash_table_t *ht, cache_inode_client_t *pclient, fsal_op_context_t *pcontext, cache_inode_status_t *pstatus)
memberdef.name: cache_inode_rename

detaileddescription.para: cache_inode_rename: renames an entry in the cache.
Renames an entry in the cache. This operation is used for moving an object into a different directory.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] entry pointer for the source directory
[IN] name of the object in the source directory
[INOUT] entry pointer for the destination directory in which the object will be moved.
[IN] name of the object in the destination directory
[OUT] contains the source directory attributes if not NULL
[OUT] contains the destination directory attributes if not NULL
[INOUT] hash table used for the cache.
[INOUT] ressource allocated by the client for the nfs management.

simplesect.para: CACHE_INODE_LRU_ERROR allocation error occured when validating the entry
CACHE_INODE_NOT_FOUND source object does not exist
